verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [V: slammed] [ARG1: the disclosure of special counsel Robert Mueller 's questions for him] , [ARGM-ADV: calling the leak " disgraceful] . "
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] on Tuesday slammed the disclosure of special counsel Robert Mueller 's questions for him , [V: calling] [ARG1: the leak] [ARG2: " disgraceful] . "
